## ResourceManager.fetchBinary() method

Fetch a binary asset by ID via the asset manager.

**Signature:**

```typescript
fetchBinary(id: string): Promise<ArrayBuffer>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

id


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Asset identifier or path.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;ArrayBuffer&gt;

A Promise that resolves to the binary content, or `null` if not found.

## Remarks

- Associates the returned data with the given ID for future reverse lookup. - The ID is typically a VFS path or locator.
